clinical_history: Assessment for renal calculus or hydronephrosis.
technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Left ovary demonstrates mildly heterogeneous morphology.
Placenta is hyperechoic and normally located.
Soft tissue region demonstrates mildly heterogeneous without fluid collection.
Thyroid gland shows homogeneous echotexture; no suspicious nodules.
Common bile duct measures 26.82 mm, within normal limits.
Testes are hypoechoic with normal vascularity.
Uterus appears mildly heterogeneous; endometrial thickness measures 34.29 mm.
